event.title: Contributing to Windows Package Manager
event.metaDesc: In this episode of Open at Microsoft we discuss how to contribute packages to the Windows Package Manager Community repository. Both wingetcreate and YAML Create are covered in this episode. As a bonus, we found a bug and demonstrate how to report those as well.
event.content: In this episode of Open at Microsoft we discuss how to contribute packages to the Windows Package Manager Community repository. Both wingetcreate and YAML Create are covered in this episode. As a bonus, we found a bug and demonstrate how to report those as well.
